GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
vhost/vsock: Use kvmalloc/kvfree for larger packets.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit e28a4e7f0296824c61a81e7fd54ab48bad3e75ad, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 433fc58e6bf2c8bd97e57153ed28e64fd78207b8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: vhost/vsock: Use kvmalloc/kvfree for larger packets.
